'''Skin Pack 2''' is a [[skin pack]] that includes 43 (originally 45) skins referencing various characters from ''[[Minecraft]]'' and other popular video games. It is exclusive to the {{editions|ps3|ps4|psvita}} of ''Minecraft'', as well as ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5.
